Summary: Orange sphere moving slowly over head.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was coming out of my garden shed and i saw my wife looked up at the sky out of the kitchen window. i looked up to see what she was looking at and i saw an orange sphere coming from the west it was very low about 80 feet above me. it made no sound and its surface looked like molten metal, it was moving slowly and i took a photo with my phone. the flash on my phone went off and the ufo slowed nearly stopping as if it had seen me. it then moved very slowly to the south and just vanished.
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Durham
There were no other sightings in Durham on or around December 24th 2009
